subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Ann's files/I_heard_the_others_knocking_John_Lennon_030108.mp3 
  Uploaded by : lisbyfarrum <lisby@...> 
  Description : After I ask why I shouldn't record at night, I get seemingly unconnected, "I hear the others knocking." "John Lennon" "Ready?" and a strange voice says, "Heaven." 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ann%27s%20files/I_heard_the_others_knocking_John_Lennon_030108.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

lisbyfarrum <lisby@...>
